title: Ep. 65 - Straight To Hell
description:
On today's episode, the guys dive headfirst into quite a bit of movie talk as they discuss some of the films they're looking forward to seeing the most in the next few months (Avengers: End Game, Godzilla, Lion King, among others),chat a little bit about "The Mule," and discuss how depressing it is to see Clint Eastwood getting as old as he is. They also discuss Will Smith's latest film, "Gemini Man," and as expected, Nick isn't too thrilled about it. Todd also brings back an actor/director version of fact or fiction, and the guys preview today's release of OCW: Straight to Hell. Later, the full crew comes into the study to discuss the Office Championship Wrestling event minutes after they finished filming. Make sure you check out OCW: Straight to Hell today at noonish on all of the Pat McAfee Inc. social media channels. This is a fun one. Come and have a good time with us.


This episode features @toddmccomas, @PatMcAfeeShow, @Digz, @nickmaraldo, @tyschmit, @BostonConnr, @HeyGorman, @VivalaZito, and @baileymccomas.
dc:creator: The Pod
